name: What Lies Below
description:
A simple RPG game inspired by NetHack, Rogue, and Diablo. Your goal is to get to max level (99) and obtain the illusive set of black "super" armor.  Trust me, if you like RPG games and other dungeon crawlers and roguelites, you'll love this. The journey to the top will be long and painful, it won't happen overnight, but it will pay off. Trust me. So what the hell are you waiting for?

Code & Art by Dylan Tuten, Art by DragonDePlatino & DawnBringer, SoundFX & Music by remaim & Jabs
